sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他是一位著名的华人科学家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhùmíng de huárén kēxuéjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est un scientifique chinois célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a famous Chinese scientist.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gāosù gōnglù shàng chēliàng hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de véhicules sur l'autoroute.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many vehicles on the highway.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó yǒu wǔqiān nián de lìshǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine a cinq mille ans d'histoire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has five thousand years of history.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān de tiānqì hěn nuǎnhuo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps au printemps est très doux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather in spring is very warm.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chuānghu cháo nán, yángguāng hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fenêtre est orientée vers le sud, il y a beaucoup de soleil.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The window faces south, with good sunlight.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他的成绩和去年差不多。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de chéngjì hé qùnián chàbuduō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats sont à peu près les mêmes que l'année dernière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His grades are about the same as last year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎshàng jiù lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'arrive tout de suite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm coming right away.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mǔqīn jié kuài dào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fête des mères arrive bientôt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Mother's Day is coming soon.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 能不能借我一下你的笔？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Néng bùnéng jiè wǒ yīxià nǐ de bǐ?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pourrais-tu me prêter ton stylo ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Could you lend me your pen?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù liánxùjù hěn shòu huānyíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette série télévisée est très populaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This TV series is very popular.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Píngmù xiǎnshì shíjiān shì jiǔ diǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'écran affiche qu'il est neuf heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The screen shows the time is nine o'clock.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zǒngshì hěn zhǔnshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est toujours ponctuel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is always on time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā mǎi le yī tái xīn zhàoxiàngjī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a acheté un nouvel appareil photo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He bought a new camera.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège zuòwèi shì kōng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette place est vide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This seat is empty.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 首先要学好基础，其次是练习。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shǒuxiān yào xuéhǎo jīchǔ, qícì shì liànxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: D'abord il faut bien apprendre les bases, ensuite pratiquer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: First learn the basics well, then practice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang kàn bào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je lis le journal chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I read the newspaper every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngcūn lǐ yǒu hěn duō niú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de vaches à la campagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many cows in the countryside.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bìng bù zhīdào zhè jiàn shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'étais pas au courant de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I didn't know about this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiànzài shì sān diǎn yī kè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est trois heures et quart.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's a quarter past three.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 天气对我的心情有影响。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiānqì duì wǒ de xīnqíng yǒu yǐngxiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps a une influence sur mon humeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather has an effect on my mood.
